name: .SCD File Extension
summary: Learn about .SCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Tax schedule file exported by TurboTax tax preparation software; includes a complete list of tax forms and schedules supported by the version of TurboTax that exported the file; saved in a plain text format that can be viewed in a text editor.

content: TuboTax saves exported SCD files with the default filename "tax.scd." This file can be imported into Quicken using the Tax Planner feature. Importing an SCD file from your version of TurboTax ensures Quicken will import all the necessary tax forms.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
